name: Sneakers Boss
description:
You have a picture of a pair of shoes and 3 options.

Pick the right one by clicking it.

The goal is to be the fastest one to give 10 correct answers, but watch out, a mistake takes away 2 good ones. There are 3 different categories.

You can play individually and be the best, but if you want to be THE BOSS, play 'Mixed up' mode and prove that you're the ONE.
